message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As a valued potential buyer, I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to sell it to you at this price today.

Thank you for considering my interest in your product, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in it. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $900000. I would like to propose an offer of $750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your budget, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $850000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for this incredible product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to keep the cost within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $800000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
